author: chris2_2_2
content: This assumes ETH doesn't grow sentience after PoS and conquer humanity leading to them being  implanted with validating brain chips

author: m.kalinin
content: 4 seconds with 1-slot finality and entire set of validators voting each slot instead of a subcommittee

author: sky.cactus
content: I'm hoping in that timeframe for some novel magic system that will allow consensus without validators at all.

author: sky.cactus
content: Alternatively, humanity will have ascended past the point where trustless is a requirement and we can quit using all of this blockchain stuff.  ðŸ˜†

author: killari.
content: trustless is a requirement for what? :)

author: sky.cactus
content: For humans interacting in interesting ways with people they do not have a pre-existing trust relationship with.

author: sky.cactus
content: One can imagine that colonies of ants and bees do not have this problem.  Any bee in the bee colony can implicitly trust any other bee of the same colony without needing to have prior experience with them.  Dogs and cats are the opposite, where by default they distrust each other (generally).
